Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's
entry*
- {passiveImg:once}Changes Ki Spheres for 7 turns: INT to Rainbow
*Basic effect(s)*
- All enemies' ATK & DEF 25%{passiveImg:down_y}
- Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every attack performed*
- {passiveImg:forever}ATK 20%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 150%)
*Per "GT Bosses" Category ally on the team*
- Ki +1
- Damage reduction rate 5%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained*
- Damage reduction rate 7%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When the character or an ally attacking in the same turn is
KO'd if HP is 50% or less*
- {passiveImg:once}Revives with 70% HP recovered
*After the character's Revival Skill is activated*
- {passiveImg:forever}Attacks are effective against all Types
- {passiveImg:forever}Launches an additional Super Attack

4770.superDescription:
Raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage and lowers ATK 
with a high chance of stunning the enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

4771.superDescription:
Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy, 
lowers ATK & DEF and seals Super Attack

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Minus Energy Power Ball
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Greatly raises ATK temporarily, 
causes ultimate damage to enemy 
and lowers ATK & DEF by 30% for 1 turn; 
disables enemy's action once within the turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when the target enemy 
is in "ATK Down" or "DEF Down" status 
starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle, 
or starting from the 6th turn 
from the start of battle (once only)

Button.Name: Is the turn count 3 or more?

2520.Paragraph Title: Starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle

Button.Name: Is the target enemy in ATK Down or DEF Down?

Button.Name: Is the turn count 6 or more?
